description:
Upward Mobility’s Physician Assistant National Certifying Exam (PANCE) prep app for Palm webOS is a valuable tool to help you pass this important exam. This practice exam/review module contains 563 questions written by professional medical writers with concise, but detailed explanations to help you prepare for this test. 
  ||  
This module covers all topics on the PANCE exam, which uses the same content blueprint as the PANRE and Pathway II, which makes this app an excellent review for these exams as well.  This app categorizes its questions into the major Organ Systems specified in the content blueprint:
Cardiovascular, Pulmonary, Endocrine, EENT, Gastrointestinal/Nutritional, Genitourinary, Musculoskeletal, Reproductive, Neurologic System, Psychiatry/Behavioral, Dermatologic, Hematologic, and Infectious Diseases.  *  As well, each category covers the Task Areas specified in the content blueprint: History Taking & Performing Physical Examinations, Using Laboratory & Diagnostic Studies, Formulating Most Likely Diagnosis, Health Maintenance, Clinical Intervention Pharmaceutical Therapeutics, and Applying Basic Science Concepts  
  ||  
Upward Mobility is not affilated with, nor is this app endorsed by the NCCPA.
  ||  
Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
